dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 10.15468/dl.dgn6g3
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Kazakhstan", "TaxonKey is Milvus migrans (Boddaert, 1783)" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 10 records from Birds of Northern Eurasia 42 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 16 records from Birds and Mammals Collections of the Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University 147 records from RU-BIRDS.RU, Birds observations database from Russia and neighboring regions. Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University. 2495 records from EOD â€“ eBird Observation Dataset 3 records from Hatikka.fi observations 1 records from NABU|naturgucker 1 records from Xeno-canto - Bird sounds from around the world 61 records from Raptors of the World 214 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
